string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Composting 101 and how to get started.
Intro workshop to Java for new programmers.
Beginner techniques to elevate your drawing skills.

string-array.name: extraDetails
string-array.item: Help Concordia cut down on organic waste sent to the landfill. Learn what can be composted at Concordia, where to compost, and what happens to the compost at Concordia.
In this workshop, explore the very basics of computer programming and see how it can help you with your graduate studies in any discipline.
We offer drawing classes in Montreal that range from introductory to advanced levels.
